title: The Church In The Wildwood
description: As fifteen-year-old Joseph Carver peels back the layers of a haunted past, he finds himself lost in the shadows of his mother's unorthodox religion; desperate to uncover the truth about his father's death and the sister he never metâ€”learning that sometimes, it is only through great loss that you can finally let go and begin to understand your own story.
author: Alanna Rusnak
